capabilities.title: Memory Pressure
capabilities.description: Shows current memory pressure level and availability

capabilities.title: VM Statistics
capabilities.description: Shows virtual memory statistics including page counts

capabilities.title: Physical Memory Summary
capabilities.description: Shows physical memory usage summary from top

capabilities.title: Total Physical Memory
capabilities.description: Shows total installed physical memory

capabilities.title: Top Memory Processes
capabilities.description: Lists top 15 processes by memory usage

capabilities.title: Disk Free Space
capabilities.description: Shows available disk space on the root volume

capabilities.title: Home Directory Usage
capabilities.description: Shows disk usage of home directory folders (top 15)

capabilities.title: Library Folder Usage
capabilities.description: Shows disk usage of Library subfolders (top 15)

capabilities.title: Find Large Files (>100MB)
capabilities.description: Finds files larger than 100MB in home directory

capabilities.title: Find Very Large Files (>1GB)
capabilities.description: Finds files larger than 1GB in home directory

capabilities.title: Disk List
capabilities.description: Lists all disks and partitions

capabilities.title: Top CPU Processes
capabilities.description: Lists top 15 processes by CPU usage

capabilities.title: CPU Information
capabilities.description: Shows CPU model and brand string

capabilities.title: CPU Core Count
capabilities.description: Shows physical and logical CPU core counts

capabilities.title: Process List
capabilities.description: Shows all running processes (top 30)

capabilities.title: System Snapshot
capabilities.description: Takes a snapshot of system status via top

capabilities.title: macOS Version
capabilities.description: Shows macOS version information

capabilities.title: Architecture
capabilities.description: Shows CPU architecture (arm64 for Apple Silicon)

capabilities.title: System Uptime
capabilities.description: Shows how long the system has been running

capabilities.title: Hardware Overview
capabilities.description: Shows detailed hardware information

capabilities.title: Storage Details
capabilities.description: Shows detailed storage information

capabilities.title: Network Interfaces
capabilities.description: Lists all network hardware ports

capabilities.title: Wi-Fi Information
capabilities.description: Shows current Wi-Fi connection details

capabilities.title: Active Connections
capabilities.description: Shows established network connections

capabilities.title: Listening Ports
capabilities.description: Shows ports listening for connections

capabilities.title: Battery Status
capabilities.description: Shows battery charge and health (MacBooks)

capabilities.title: Flush DNS Cache
capabilities.description: Clears the DNS resolver cache to fix name resolution issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: DNS cache rebuilds automatically as you browse

capabilities.title: Clear Temp Files
capabilities.description: Removes temporary files from user caches
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Temp files are created as needed by apps

capabilities.title: Reset Quick Look
capabilities.description: Resets Quick Look preview cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Previews regenerate automatically when needed

capabilities.title: Restart Finder
capabilities.description: Restarts Finder to fix display or navigation issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Finder restarts automatically

capabilities.title: Restart Dock
capabilities.description: Restarts the Dock to fix icon or animation issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Dock restarts automatically

capabilities.title: Restart Menu Bar
capabilities.description: Restarts SystemUIServer to fix menu bar glitches
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Menu bar restarts automatically

capabilities.title: Restart Control Center
capabilities.description: Restarts Control Center to fix display issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Control Center restarts automatically

capabilities.title: Restart Notification Center
capabilities.description: Restarts Notification Center to fix notification issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Notification Center restarts automatically

capabilities.title: Purge Inactive Memory
capabilities.description: Releases inactive memory back to the system
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Memory state is temporary; system manages memory automatically

capabilities.title: Sync & Purge Memory
capabilities.description: Syncs disks then purges inactive memory
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Memory state is temporary

capabilities.title: Clear User Caches
capabilities.description: Removes all user-level application caches
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Apps will rebuild caches as needed. Some apps may run slower initially.

capabilities.title: Clear Apple App Caches
capabilities.description: Removes only Apple application caches
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Apple apps will rebuild caches as needed

capabilities.title: Clear Old Caches (7+ days)
capabilities.description: Removes cache files not accessed in 7+ days
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Only removes stale cache files; active caches preserved

capabilities.title: Clear User Logs
capabilities.description: Removes all user-level log files
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Logs are recreated by apps as needed. Diagnostic history will be lost.

capabilities.title: Clear Old Logs (7+ days)
capabilities.description: Removes log files not modified in 7+ days
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Only removes old logs; recent logs preserved

capabilities.title: Clear Crash Reports
capabilities.description: Removes application crash reports
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Crash reports cannot be recovered. New crashes will generate new reports.

capabilities.title: Clear Saved App State
capabilities.description: Removes saved application states (window positions, etc.)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Apps will start fresh without remembering window positions

capabilities.title: Clear System Temp
capabilities.description: Removes system temporary files (requires admin)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: System temp files are recreated as needed

capabilities.title: Clear ASL Logs
capabilities.description: Removes Apple System Log files (requires admin)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: System logs are recreated. Old log entries will be lost.

capabilities.title: Safari Tab Count
capabilities.description: Shows the number of open tabs in Safari
capabilities.commandTemplate:
osascript -e 'tell application "Safari"
set tabCount to 0
repeat with w in windows
set tabCount to tabCount + (count of tabs of w)
end repeat
return tabCount
end tell'

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Automation permission required for Safari. Go to System Settings > Privacy & Security > Automation.

capabilities.title: List Safari Tabs
capabilities.description: Lists all open Safari tab URLs
capabilities.commandTemplate:
osascript -e 'tell application "Safari"
set urlList to {}
repeat with w in windows
repeat with t in tabs of w
set end of urlList to URL of t
end repeat
end repeat
return urlList
end tell'

capabilities.title: Close All Safari Tabs
capabilities.description: Closes all tabs in all Safari windows
capabilities.commandTemplate:
osascript -e 'tell application "Safari"
repeat with w in windows
try
tell w to close (tabs)
end try
end repeat
end tell'
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Tabs cannot be recovered. Use Safari > History to revisit closed pages.

capabilities.title: Quit Safari
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits Safari
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Safari can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Force Quit Safari
capabilities.description: Force quits Safari immediately
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Unsaved work may be lost

capabilities.title: Clear Safari Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Safari browser cache files

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Safari before clearing cache

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Cache rebuilds automatically. Websites may load slower initially.

capabilities.title: Clear Safari Local Storage
capabilities.description: Removes Safari local storage data

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Safari before clearing local storage

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Website preferences and saved data will be lost

capabilities.title: Chrome Tab Count
capabilities.description: Shows the number of open tabs in Chrome
capabilities.commandTemplate:
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome"
set tabCount to 0
repeat with w in windows
set tabCount to tabCount + (count of tabs of w)
end repeat
return tabCount
end tell'

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Automation permission required for Chrome. Go to System Settings > Privacy & Security > Automation.

capabilities.title: List Chrome Tabs
capabilities.description: Lists all open Chrome tab URLs
capabilities.commandTemplate:
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome"
set urlList to {}
repeat with w in windows
repeat with t in tabs of w
set end of urlList to URL of t
end repeat
end repeat
return urlList
end tell'

capabilities.title: Close All Chrome Tabs
capabilities.description: Closes all tabs in all Chrome windows
capabilities.commandTemplate:
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome"
repeat with w in windows
try
close tabs of w
end try
end repeat
end tell'
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Tabs cannot be recovered. Use Chrome > History to revisit closed pages.

capabilities.title: Quit Chrome
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits Google Chrome
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Chrome can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Force Quit Chrome
capabilities.description: Force quits Chrome immediately
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Unsaved work may be lost

capabilities.title: Kill Chrome Helpers
capabilities.description: Kills Chrome helper processes (tabs/extensions)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: May crash Chrome tabs. Browser may become unstable.

capabilities.title: Clear Chrome Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Chrome browser cache files

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Chrome before clearing cache

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Cache rebuilds automatically. Websites may load slower initially.

capabilities.title: Quit Edge
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits Microsoft Edge
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Edge can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Force Quit Edge
capabilities.description: Force quits Microsoft Edge immediately
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Unsaved work may be lost

capabilities.title: Clear Edge Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Microsoft Edge browser cache files

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Edge before clearing cache

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Cache rebuilds automatically

capabilities.title: Quit Brave
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits Brave Browser
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Brave can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Force Quit Brave
capabilities.description: Force quits Brave Browser immediately
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Unsaved work may be lost

capabilities.title: Clear Brave Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Brave browser cache files

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Brave before clearing cache

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Cache rebuilds automatically

capabilities.title: Quit Firefox
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits Firefox
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Firefox can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Force Quit Firefox
capabilities.description: Force quits Firefox immediately
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Unsaved work may be lost

capabilities.title: Clear Firefox Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Firefox browser cache files

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Firefox before clearing cache

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Cache rebuilds automatically

capabilities.title: Quit Arc
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits Arc browser
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Arc can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Clear Arc Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Arc browser cache files

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Please quit Arc before clearing cache

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Cache rebuilds automatically

capabilities.title: Quit All Browsers
capabilities.description: Gracefully quits all major browsers
capabilities.commandTemplate: osascript -e 'tell application "Safari" to quit' -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to quit' -e 'tell application "Firefox" to quit' -e 'tell application "Microsoft Edge" to quit' -e 'tell application "Brave Browser" to quit' -e 'tell application "Arc" to quit' 2>/dev/null
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Browsers can be relaunched manually

capabilities.title: Find Heavy Browser Processes
capabilities.description: Lists browser helper processes sorted by memory usage
capabilities.commandTemplate: ps aux | grep -E "Helper|Web Content" | grep -E "Safari|Chrome|Edge|Brave|Firefox" | sort -k4 -rn | head -20

capabilities.title: Clear Xcode Derived Data
capabilities.description: Removes Xcode build caches and derived data

preflightChecks.failureMessage: Xcode Derived Data folder not found. Is Xcode installed?

capabilities.rollbackNotes: Xcode will rebuild on next build. Clean builds may be slower.

capabilities.title: Clear Xcode Archives
capabilities.description: Removes Xcode app archives (use with caution)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Archives cannot be recovered. You will lose ability to symbolicate old crash logs.

capabilities.title: Clear iOS Device Support
capabilities.description: Removes iOS device support files (re-downloaded on connect)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Device support is re-downloaded when you connect an iOS device

capabilities.title: Clear watchOS Device Support
capabilities.description: Removes watchOS device support files
capabilities.rollbackNotes: watchOS support is re-downloaded when you connect an Apple Watch

capabilities.title: Clear Simulator Caches
capabilities.description: Removes iOS Simulator cache files
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Simulator caches rebuild as needed

capabilities.title: Delete Unavailable Simulators
capabilities.description: Removes iOS simulators for unavailable runtimes
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Removes only simulators with missing runtimes

capabilities.title: Erase All Simulators
capabilities.description: Erases all content and settings from all simulators
capabilities.rollbackNotes: All simulator data will be erased. Apps and settings cannot be recovered.

capabilities.title: Clear CocoaPods Cache
capabilities.description: Removes CocoaPods downloaded pod cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Pods will be re-downloaded on next install

capabilities.title: Clear CocoaPods Repos
capabilities.description: Removes CocoaPods spec repositories
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Specs will be re-downloaded on next pod install

capabilities.title: Clear npm Cache
capabilities.description: Cleans the npm package cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Packages will be re-downloaded on next install

capabilities.title: Clear Yarn Cache
capabilities.description: Cleans the Yarn package cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Packages will be re-downloaded on next install

capabilities.title: Clear pip Cache
capabilities.description: Cleans the Python pip package cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Packages will be re-downloaded on next install

capabilities.title: Clear Gradle Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Gradle build cache files
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Dependencies will be re-downloaded on next build

capabilities.title: Clear Swift PM Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Swift Package Manager cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Packages will be re-downloaded on next build

capabilities.title: Homebrew Cleanup
capabilities.description: Removes old versions and clears Homebrew cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Old versions are removed. Use brew install to reinstall if needed.

capabilities.title: Homebrew Autoremove
capabilities.description: Removes unused Homebrew dependencies
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Orphaned dependencies are removed

capabilities.title: Clear Homebrew Cache
capabilities.description: Removes Homebrew download cache
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Downloads will be re-fetched if needed

capabilities.title: Docker Disk Usage
capabilities.description: Shows Docker disk space usage breakdown

capabilities.title: Docker Prune Unused
capabilities.description: Removes unused Docker containers, networks, and images
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Stopped containers and unused images are removed

capabilities.title: Docker Prune All
capabilities.description: Removes ALL unused Docker data including volumes
capabilities.rollbackNotes: All unused images, containers, and volumes are removed. Data cannot be recovered.

capabilities.title: Trash Size
capabilities.description: Shows current size of the Trash folder

capabilities.title: Empty Trash
capabilities.description: Permanently removes all items in user Trash
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Deleted files cannot be recovered

capabilities.title: Empty All Trashes
capabilities.description: Empties Trash on all mounted volumes (requires admin)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Deleted files cannot be recovered from any volume

capabilities.title: Downloads Size
capabilities.description: Shows current size of the Downloads folder

capabilities.title: Restart Audio Service
capabilities.description: Restarts the Core Audio daemon to fix audio issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Audio service restarts automatically. Audio may cut out briefly.

capabilities.title: Restart Preferences Daemon
capabilities.description: Restarts the preferences daemon to fix settings issues
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Preferences daemon restarts automatically

capabilities.title: Run Daily Maintenance
capabilities.description: Executes macOS daily maintenance scripts

capabilities.title: Run Weekly Maintenance
capabilities.description: Executes macOS weekly maintenance scripts

capabilities.title: Run Monthly Maintenance
capabilities.description: Executes macOS monthly maintenance scripts

capabilities.title: Run Full Maintenance
capabilities.description: Executes all macOS maintenance scripts (daily, weekly, monthly)

capabilities.title: Spotlight Status
capabilities.description: Shows Spotlight indexing status for root volume

capabilities.title: Rebuild Spotlight Index
capabilities.description: Rebuilds the Spotlight search index (may take hours)
capabilities.rollbackNotes: Spotlight will be unavailable during reindex. CPU may spike.

capabilities.title: List Launch Jobs
capabilities.description: Shows all launchd jobs (background processes)

capabilities.title: User Launch Agents
capabilities.description: Lists user-level launch agents

capabilities.title: System Launch Agents
capabilities.description: Lists system-level launch agents
